### Getting Started

# Installation (v1)

## Legacy installation guide

This is the v1 installation process. For the current installation method, see the [latest documentation](page:installation).

### Installation steps

- Download the package
- Run the setup script
- Configure your environment

### Note

The v1 installation process has been superseded by a simpler pnpm-based workflow in v2.
